globalcssjs-warning-js: Notice on top of edit window
globalcssjs-warning-css: Notice on top of edit window
globalcssjs-custom-js:
Link text for link to a user's global.js page.
{{Identical|Custom JavaScript}}
globalcssjs-custom-css:
Link text for a link to a user's global.css page.
{{Identical|Custom CSS}}
globalcssjs-delete-css:
Used as a deletion summary when deleting a user's CSS page
Parameters:
* $1 - username, for GENDER support
globalcssjs-delete-js:
Used as a deletion summary when deleting a user's JavaScript page
Parameters:
* $1 - username, for GENDER support
